add_card: Add a card to your packet!
are_you_sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?
term_tutorial: This is where you'll write the term. The other fields are optional!
pos_tutorial: This is where you'll choose the term's part of speech
needs_revision_tutorial: If unsure about the card, you can mark that it needs revision
tags_tutorial: This is where you add tags to search by later. For example, if you add a "food" tag to all food-related cards, it will be easy to search them later
are_you_sure_exit_without_save: Are you sure you want to exit without saving?
welcome1: Welcome to LanguCards, an app for language learners!
welcome2: Log your vocabulary, study it and search it.
welcome3: Our search mechanism will help you retrieve those words that elude your memory mid-conversation so that you never fail to speak like a native.
welcome4: Save this app to your home screen.
